English: Just as I thought. Guards everywhere.
German: Wie ich es mir gedacht hatte. Überall Wachen.

English: Watch yourself. They seem way out of your league.
Chinese:
別掉以輕心。
對方是國家公權力，被發現我們就完了。
German:
Sei vorsichtig. Gegen die hast du sicher keine
Chance.

English: How about I show you what I'm made of, eh?!
Chinese: 妳這傢伙……明明就一副瞧不起我的樣子……！
Korean: 이 자식… 내 앞에서는 얕보는 태도로 나오던 주제에…!
German: Soll ich dir mal zeigen, was ich draufhabe?!

English:
Cool it, you two. They'll see us. But what are you
planning to do?
Chinese:
別吵了，會被發現的。
──然後呢，接下來要怎麼做？
German:
Reißt euch zusammen, ihr zwei. Sie werden uns
sehen. Was hast du vor?

English: Hehe, just leave it to me.
